cars.title: ’67 Dart Vader
cars.subtitle: Classic Period-correct restoration
cars.altText: ’67 Dart Vader three quarters rear left
cars.text:
• Resprayed in original A4 silver
  • Original 340 engine
  • Original 4-speed transmission w/Hurst shifter
  • Original 8 ¾” Sure-Grip rear end
  • Every nut and bolt on this car was touched
  • Period-correct restoration using NOS parts wherever possible
  • High-quality aftermarket parts when needed

cars.title: ’69 Barracuda Formula S
cars.subtitle: Complete ground-up rebuild
cars.altText: ’69 Barracuda Formula S three quarters front left
cars.text: This is one fine MOPAR! After almost a year in the shop, getting every last inch of old ground, sanded, painted, buffed and polished out, this classic restoration project went up at Barrett Jackson/Las Vegas 2013.
